span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 禁闭，监禁：to shut or keep in, especially to imprison
【例】The thief was confined in a prison. 小偷被监禁在监狱里。
【近】imprison[ɪm'prɪzn], commit, confine, immure, incarcerate[ɪn'kɑːsəreɪt], jail
【反】discharge, free, liberate, release 释放
【考法 2】 v. 限制：to keep within limits
【例】Please confine yourself to the subject 请限制你在这个话题。
【近】limit, circumscribe, restrict
【反】exceed 超越，超过
【记】 con一起 + fine罚款→限制
【另】 define 定义，definite 明确的
